action-group.diy-instructions:
After installation, go to your Administrator Control Panel. Click on Systems tab. On the left hand side, choose "Administation Control Panel" under "Module Management". Then choose "General", then "Board Configuration". In the drop down select "Profile friends mod". Add Module, and complete! make sure to click “Enable”.
Before using this MOD clear your cache and refresh your theme!. Go to the index page of the ACP and choose 'Purge Cache' To refresh your theme click the styles tab -- theme and click refresh beside the theme you installed the mod on!
